studyArms.name: ALXN1840 Treatment
studyArms.description: Single-arm treatment where participants receive ALXN1840 15 mg/day for 28 days followed by titration to 30 mg/day.

studyCohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for ≤ 28 days

arms.name: ALXN1840 Treatment
arms.description: Single-arm treatment where participants receive ALXN1840 15 mg/day for 28 days followed by titration to 30 mg/day.

doseEpochs.description: Initial treatment period including accumulation and steady-state assessment.
Titrated dose period following SRC safety review.

cohorts.name: Cohort 1 (Treatment experienced)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for > 28 days

cohorts.name: Cohort 2 (Treatment naïve)
cohorts.characteristic: Patients who have received WD therapy for ≤ 28 days

epochs.name: Screening
epochs.description: Up to 21 days prior to enrollment

epochs.name: Run-in Period
epochs.description: Day -7 to Day -1; includes diet equilibration and baseline copper/molybdenum balance measurement.

epochs.name: Inpatient Period 1
epochs.description: Day -8 to Day 9; includes baseline and initial 15 mg/day accumulation phase.

epochs.name: Outpatient Period
epochs.description: Day 9 to Day 23; maintenance of 15 mg/day dosing.

epochs.name: Inpatient Period 2
epochs.description: Day 23 to Day 40; includes 15 mg steady state and 30 mg titration/steady state assessment.
